name: The Wizard
description:
The Wizard is The Magic Fantasy Adventure. He helps him to find the Mistery Tower and discover the secrets fields of Wizardrym.

Can you find The Wizard on this mysterious and magical Journey to the Final Destination?
Rush throught the Space before the Time runs out.

This game is based upon the modern 80,s tale written by Gilles Villeneuve, The Wizard.

Key Features


  • For fans of 2D Open World and Metroidvanias.
  • Maze Runner like game, explore, find and talk to secret Characters to acess secret Areas.
  • Multiple endings, cinematic, story driven and non linear.
  • Secret 22 characters and 22 areas to find.
  • Short game, about 2 hours.
  • Not an Action Combat, but Puzzle Exploration focused.
  • Amazing graphics and sound.

The Wizard is a 2D Open World Sandbox game inspired on the very good Metroidvania genre titles.

Talk, Run, Explore. Find secret passages and characters and discover a Dark Fantasy World full of secrets.

The Wizard is a modern Maze Runner Adventure.

Can you find The Wizard before your Time runs out?
